data.title: Trailer: Vacation Horror THE RESORT Now Takes Us to a Haunted Island
data.meta_description: Check out the trailer for Vertical Entertainment and writer-directorTaylor Chien's The Resort in select theaters and VOD beginning April 30th
data.text:
There’s an entire subgenre of horror movies dedicated to vacations from hell, but this one has a supernatural twist! Look for The Resort in select theaters and VOD beginning April 30th from Vertical Entertainment! Check out the trailer and read more about the movie below.

RELATED: Trailer: Barbara Crampton Offers Shocking SACRIFICE in Lovecraftian Horror Movie from DREAD!

That trailer looks like fun to us. Check out the poster below!

Synopsis:

Four friends head to Hawaii to investigate reports of a haunting at an abandoned resort in hopes of finding the infamous Half-Faced Girl. When they arrive, they soon learn you should be careful what you wish for.

The Resort is written and directed by Taylor Chien (Cornered). Bianca Haase (Hot Tub Time Machine 2) stars along with Brock O’Hurn (Boo 2! A Madea Halloween) and also Michael Vlamis (Roswell, New Mexico). Michelle Randolph (A Snow White Christmas) rounds out the killer cast along with Joaquin Veizaga (Good Trouble, Good Behavior).

What do you think of the trailer and synopsis for The Resort? Are you excited to check the film out in April? Let us know in the comments below or on Facebook, Twitter, or Instagram! You can also carry on the convo with me personally on Twitter @josh_millican.
